Peck Their Eyes Out!.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ([[/damage 1d6 + 2 type=piercing]]) damage, and the target is &Reference[condition=blinded] until the end of its next turn.

Larceny.name: Larceny
Larceny.description: P.O.L.L.Y. attempts to steal one Tiny item being worn or carried by a creature within its reach. P.O.L.L.Y. makes a Dexterity (&Reference[skill=SleightofHand]{Sleight of Hand}) check against the creature's passive &Reference[skill=Perception] score, stealing the item on a success.

Ship Sense.name: Ship Sense
Ship Sense.description: While in contact with a water vehicle, P.O.L.L.Y. knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the vehicle.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: P.O.L.L.Y. doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: P.O.L.L.Y. is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description:
P.O.L.L.Y. has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
